TextBlock.Text: <color=red>WARNING</color>: A fuel leak has been detected in the <color=orange>main corridor</color>.

Running System Diagnostics:
<color=orange>Fuel Reserves</color>: 98% <color=orange>Structural Integrity</color>: 99.98% <color=orange>Engine Status</color>: Fully operational
The main corridor to the <color=orange>engine room</color> has been sealed to prevent further breach of containment.
Remember to wear adequate equipment when dealing with hazardous materials.
